query:
ALTER TABLE fact_update_notifications
ADD COLUMN action_url VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN action_type ENUM('view_details', 'mark_read', 'dismiss', 'custom') DEFAULT 'view_details',
ADD COLUMN action_label VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'View Details';
command:

ADD COLUMN action_url VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN action_type ENUM('view_details', 'mark_read', 'dismiss', 'custom') DEFAULT 'view_details',
ADD COLUMN action_label VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'View Details';
